<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>For all existing hr criteria, create user criteria (same name as hr criteria) with advanced script to evaluate the hr criteria.</description>
        <name>Create user criteria per hr criteria</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var hrCriteria = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_criteria');
hrCriteria.query();

while(hrCriteria.next()){
   var userCriteriaName = gs.getMessage("{0} (HR Criteria)", hrCriteria.getValue("name"));
   var userCriteriaSysId = new global.HRSecurityUtils().createNewUserCriteria(hrCriteria.sys_id, userCriteriaName);
   if (userCriteriaSysId){
	   gs.info("Created new User Criteria: " + userCriteriaName + " from HR Criteria: " +   hrCriteria.name);
	   hrCriteria.related_user_criteria.setValue(userCriteriaSysId);
	   hrCriteria.update();
   }
}]]></script>
